title: TMCP: a new way to build MCP servers in TS
description: The typescript SDK provider by the official model context protocol organization is nice and has a lot of features baked in. But it also has a few problems that makes it difficult to use with modern frameworks. TMCP is a brand new alternative sdk, fully featured with an aim to a lean, modern API and ease of use. In this talk we are gonna explore what those limitations are and take a look at how TMCP solves them.
